name: LetterChaos
description:
Letters are coming in endless ways. Use your mouse to drag letters and create words and avoid the overload of the screen.

You can right-click on a single letter to change it (up to 3 times)

Once you create a word, right-click on it to solve it and get the points!

Get as much points as possible but beware, if you get more than 50 letters you'll be overloaded and the game will be over!
